title: Level 5 on Boards?
body: I'm level 20 and it says I cant post anything on forums because I'm level 5.

replies.body: I am also level 5 still and its been 2 years

This is because Boards is actually a completely separate system from the client and the game itself.  Now that you posted on Boards here, your level should automatically sync to what it is in game.  From taking a look, it seems like it is displaying level 19!

Let me know if you have any other questions!
Thanks man, I noticed after I posted this that my Summoner icon changed.
